pullrequest.title: Proposal: scoping rules, allow everything to use //pose[@relative_to]

content.raw:
Ideally, if a world \+ models are completely inlined, it would be nice if a world could “reach into” a model, and perhaps even vice versa. This is namely to support the welding workflow mentioned in the nesting proposal.

However, this would require `<include/>` to act as a scope boundary…

Ultimately, perhaps we don't allow the scope crossing for now, and let that be handled by the nesting proposal? \(Which would give us more time to document the existing `<include/>` behavior, etc.?\)
